Title: Ghost in the Shell 2.0
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Crime, Drama, Sci-Fi
Actors: Atsuko Tanaka, Akio Ôtsuka, Kôichi Yamadera, Tesshô Genda
Plot: A hacker known as the Puppet Master is hunted by a female cyborg cop and her partner. This film is a revised version of Ghost in the Shell (1995).
